item.title: Car length pot hole, 3rd December
item.description:
This was reported about 6 months ago and closed pending work, no work has been done...the pot hole is now the width of a car and easily 25cm deep, its extremely dangerous for cars swerving, motorbikes & cyclists, not to mention that this will cause damage to people's cars, alloys and suspension. This needs to be fixed as soon as possible
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 138, Mayplace Road East, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mushy slushy leaves on pavements and kerbs, 3rd December
item.description:
This is my 3rd report of mushy slushy leaves on pavements and in kerbs from 2-18 Maxted Road. The leaves dropped weeks ago and have still not been cleared. Instead they are turning to mush and are slippery and dangerous. The block kerbs means drainage does not work properly. Please can this be cleared (preferably not by a leaf blower that just splatters parked cars and fronts of houses). Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Maxted Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roots lifting pavement, 3rd December
item.description:
Tree roots are causing considerable damage to pavement and it is now an extreme height change. Large cracks are emerging and this has become a major trip hazard - you can regularly see people stumble and trip on this area of pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Mead, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Woodrow House, Canterbury Terrace, Canterbury Road, 3rd December
item.description:
I do NOT know the Column Numbers it’s ALL The Lights outside Woodrow House NW6 Canterbury Terrace or Road. It’s SO DARK at Nights and SCARY to walk along as NONE of The Lights outside Woodrow Court are on. The Roads are BUSY and an Accident is waiting to happen as Outside Woodrow House is so DARK. These Column Lights Need Switching on Sooner rather than later.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Canterbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
